tiles.name: Company
tiles.description: A group of diverse fairy people lives under the menace of a greater evil.

tiles.name: Ring
tiles.description: One day, they found a magic ring which is a powerful talisman of the villain.

tiles.name: Quest
tiles.description: Then, they travel the entire continent grouping people.

tiles.name: Sauron
tiles.description: So they defeat the greater evil by destroying its source of power.

tiles.name: Orphan
tiles.description: An orphan kid lives alone with their relatives.

tiles.name: Spider
tiles.description: One day, he gets bitten by a radioactive spider.

tiles.name: Superhero
tiles.description: Then, they use their superpowers for a greater good.

tiles.name: Responsability
tiles.description: So they learn to be responsible and to protect their loved ones.
